value.title: ACM Prize in Computing recognizes pioneer of robot learning
value.excerpt: ACM, the Association for Computing Machinery, today named Pieter Abbeel the recipient of the 2021 ACM Prize in Computing for contributions to robot learning, including learning from demonstrations and deep reinforcement learning for robotic control.

value.title: OpenAI’s DALL-E AI image generator can now edit pictures, too

value.title: Spot goes to Pompeii: Why a robot dog is patrolling ancient ruins
value.excerpt: Boston Dynamics’ robot dog Spot has been tasked with a new job - patrolling the ancient ruins of Pompeii. The robot will be used to inspect the site for safety issues and record structural changes over time to better manage the historic ruins.

value.title: AI and Robotics Uncover Hidden Signatures of Parkinson’s Disease

value.title: The Dangers Of Not Aligning Artificial Intelligence With Human Values
